Uses of Package
org.apache.hc.core5.pool

  • Packages that use org.apache.hc.core5.pool 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.nio  
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io
    Default implementations of client side connection pools for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.nio
    Default implementations of client side connection pools for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool  
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool.io
    Client side connection pools APIs for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool.nio
    Client side connection pools APIs for asynchronous, event driven communication.
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.nio 
    Class and Description
    ConnPool
    ConnPool represents a shared pool connections can be leased from and released back to.
    PoolEntry
    Pool entry containing a pool connection object along with its route.
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io 
    Class and Description
    ConnPool
    ConnPool represents a shared pool connections can be leased from and released back to.
    ConnPoolControl
    Interface to control runtime properties of a ConnPool such as maximum total number of connections or maximum connections per route allowed.
    PoolEntry
    Pool entry containing a pool connection object along with its route.
